entry.title: SHCBA04
entry.summary:
Vendor: STARMAXDESIGN
Type:
Price: 0.00

Hollow crystal brick is a lightweight building material with appearance and characteristics similar to crystal brick but has more advantages in terms of weight and installation. Hollow crystal bricks are also made of high-purity glass materials, but a hollow structure design is used in manufacturing to make them lighter.

The color and surface pattern of hollow crystal bricks are similar to those of crystal bricks, and different colors and decorative designs can be selected according to needs. Hollow crystal bricks have lightweight, sound insulation, moisture, and wear resistance while maintaining crystal bricks' transparency and light refraction effect, bringing modernity and brilliance to the space. Hollow crystal bricks are suitable for interior wall and ceiling decoration, especially for places where building weight needs to be reduced, such as commercial spaces, hotel lobbies, etc.
